pr_title: [typescript-angular]: objects as query parameters no longer break when fields are null

timeline.message: #5174 fix [BUG] [typescript-angular]: objects as query parameters break when fields are null

timeline.author: macjohnny

timeline.bodyText: this won't match the template, a whitespace is missing
timeline.author: macjohnny

replies.bodyText: The whitespace went missing when the sample code was generated :(
replies.author: daniel-frak

replies.bodyText: To clarify, all I did in this commit was run ./bin/typescript-angular-petstore-all.sh and the generated code was missing the whitespace. I believe the CI failed because I added the space manually previously.
replies.author: daniel-frak

replies.bodyText: yes, you need to run mvn clean package before re-generating the samples
replies.author: macjohnny

timeline.message: #5174 Regenerate typescript-angular samples a second time
